document.full_text: the united states showed increasing alarm about japan's nuclear crisis on wednesday and urged its citizens to stay clear of an earthquake-crippled power plant, going further in its warnings than japan itself.
document.title: u.s. shows growing alarm over japan nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: the united states showed increasing alarm about japan's nuclear crisis on wednesday and urged its citizens to stay clear of an earthquake-crippled power plant, going further in its warnings than japan itself.
